page.title: 10Rattlesden - Housing
page.content:
{Rattlesden Village Comprises new and old properties (many restored) plus some council houses. {Borley Green - Hamlet } Bungalows along road (approx. 12) plus two farms one of which is moated. {Drinkstone Green - Hamlet} Restored cottages, some council houses, new large houses and two farmhouses. {Poy St Green - Hamlet} Approximatley 12 houses which are a mixture of very new and modernized old cottages.
The area has 21 large farm houses, many restored and modernized, including 3 moated farm houses. Also{Clopton Hall}which is an extensively restored old house standing in its own parkland.
